name: hyunu-blog-monorepo
description: Hyunu's Blog Monorepo with multiple backend framework options

scripts.dev: yarn workspace @hyunu/blog dev & yarn workspace @hyunu/backend dev
scripts.build: yarn workspace @hyunu/ui build && yarn workspace @hyunu/backend build && yarn workspace @hyunu/blog build
scripts.build:apps: yarn workspace @hyunu/backend build && yarn workspace @hyunu/blog build
